sen.j: その詳しい動向は不明であるが、以仁王の挙兵で自害した頼政の首は国政の美濃の領地内（現在の岐阜県関市蓮華寺）に葬られたという伝説が存在する。
sen.e: Although the situation in details was unknown, there is a legend that the head of Yorimasa who killed himself during the Rising of Prince Mochihito was buried in the Mino territory of Kunimasa (present Rengeji, Seki City, Gifu Prefecture).
